Class TypeDescriptors

java.lang.Object
org.microbean.construct.vm.TypeDescriptors
public final class TypeDescriptors extends Object
A utility class that provides TypeDescriptors for TypeMirrors.
Author:
Laird Nelson
See Also:
  • typeDescriptor(TypeMirror, Domain)
  • TypeDescriptor.descriptorString()
External Specifications
  • Java Virtual Machine Specification, section 4.3

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static final TypeDescriptor
    typeDescriptor(TypeMirror t, Domain d)
    Returns a TypeDescriptor for the supplied TypeMirror, or null if there is no such TypeDescriptor

    Methods inherited from class Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • typeDescriptor

      public static final TypeDescriptor typeDescriptor(TypeMirror t, Domain d)
      Returns a TypeDescriptor for the supplied TypeMirror, or null if there is no such TypeDescriptor
      Parameters:
      t - a TypeMirror; must not be null; must have a TypeKind that is either TypeKind.ARRAY, TypeKind.BOOLEAN, TypeKind.BYTE, TypeKind.CHAR, TypeKind.DECLARED, TypeKind.DOUBLE, TypeKind.EXECUTABLE, TypeKind.FLOAT, TypeKind.INT, TypeKind.LONG, TypeKind.SHORT, TypeKind.TYPEVAR, or TypeKind.VOID for a non-null TypeDescriptor to be returned
      d - a Domain; must not be null
      Returns:
      a TypeDescriptor, or null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if either argument is null
      See Also:
      • TypeDescriptor.descriptorString()
